content.detailedDescription: I did this before
content.summary: I did this before

content.detailedDescription:
It's been a long time and i was very young at the time, 7 years old.  1990.  

i woke up on my top bunk and saw a moving light under the door leading to the room behind mine.  i got up and went to open the door thinking someone in my family was awake making noise, i was ready to tell them to shut up because i was trying to sleep.  i opened the door and saw what looked like 3 skeletons but with joints where they should be, you could still see the gap in the bones, but the joints were still there.  they had heads similar to ours, not bulbous or overinflated like people usually describe greys.  when i walked in i saw the light was coming from their eyes, i'll never ever forget it, bright yellow light shining in direct beams that spread out slightly over distance.   

i flipped out for a second like seeing a 2 foot spider makes you kinda jump up and flap your wrists around because you are completely freaked the [cms/tg/pd] out.  then i yelled for my parents and my older brother as loud as i could and the "aliens" eyes stopped glowing.  the one in the center told me "your family can't hear you".  i said, yelled very angrily "what the hell did you do to my family [cms/tg/pd]!"  and ran towards him in an attempt to beat them mercilessly.  then their eyes didn't shine beams of light, they looked like they were on fire with the same yellow light but in dancing flames.  they screamed at me with their mouths which looked very strange, as though their lips were tightly pulled back, very thin lips, extremely skinny thin face dark patchy gray color (some parts were dark gray, others were light gray).  i stopped and said "ok, you win, i didn't like them that much anyway".  they kind of wobbled and bounced in place in a strange way and seemed to laugh.  then the one in the center asked "why aren't you asleep?"  i told him, "your in my house without permission, why don't you answer my questions".  he said "what do you want?",  i said "what do you want?".  him - "ask your questions".  me - "are you angels?", he shook his head no.  me - "are you demons?".  he shook his head no.  me - "then what they hell are you, because i've never seen anything like you before and i read zoobooks all the time and have never heard of another animal like you aside from people."  he said "people call us aliens".  i said "like illegal aliens?  my dad's always making fun of them".  him - "something like that, space aliens. we don't live on your planet".  me - "then where the hell do you live?  you're telling me you aren't angels, you're not demons, you're obviously not people...Whatever dude, you lost me."  he laughed and his companions looked at each other.  i got pissed off and defensive and said "don't be a butthole!"  he said - "it's ok, you're handling this better than any adult." (paused for a minute and talked amongst each other) i said - " hey! i'm still here."  they said - "what do you want?" i said - "don't be a smartass" (if you can't tell by now i was a foul mouthed kid and loved cussing, for whatever reason it was just so amazing to me back then, the concept that words actually had power...Not so these days).  he said - "no, i mean what do you want, if you could have anything in life, what would it be"  i said - "a lot of money, all the money in the world".  him - " seriously?"  me - " yeah you're right, they always tell me in church that is a selfish wish"  at this point i started think about all this stuff in church and about how knowledge is always more powerful than money. (back when i believed in god and all the nonsense that is organized religion).  i told them, - " i want knowledge, i want as much knowledge as possible and the wisdom of how to use it, that's what i should want right? i want to be really, really smart, smarter than everyone else.  i want to know the meaning of life, that's what everyone says is the ultimate answer and question right? that's what my brother said yesterday.  and i want to be really strong too."  him - " yeah, that's good, we can do that, but you've got to let us take you"  me - " what do you mean take me? you can't just kidnap me, i can't really trust you, you did just break into my house and may have killed my family".  him - "i told you, your family is fine, they're just asleep."  me - "that's exactly what a killer would say".  him - " go check after we leave." me - "ok".  him - "but here's your wish, gravity.  the answer to the meaning of life is gravity.  you don't understand gravity".  me - "what's gravity?"  him - " exactly".  me- "what the hell are you talking about?"  him - "you'll understand when you're older"  me - "how much older?"  him - "your late teens early twenties" throughout the conversation i had begun moving closer and closer to him as we talked, at this point my eyes started adjusting to the darkness and i saw that he wasn't moving his mouth when he talked.  and then i got freaked out and yelled "alright! that's just too much! what are you! tell me right now [cms/tg/pd]!" and i got in my brother's karate stance. their eyes all began to glow yellow and looked like they were burning like bright yellow flames in their eye sockets.  i threw my hands down and said, "i'm done with this, get out, take care".  

went back into my room and closed the door.  i came back just as quickly as i had closed the door yelling while i was walking to the door "next time you stop by ring the damn doorbell you bunch of..." i had opened the door by this point and they were gone.  i turned on the light switch checked out the room, went downstairs and checked every room in the house (except the basement because it scared the [cms/tg/pd] out of me at the time), went back upstairs, woke up my brother who asked me what i wanted to which i replied "just making sure you're alive like they promised" my brother - "like who promised?"  "the aliens" i said as i left his room to go to my parents room.  i woke up my parents, they asked "what's wrong?" i said - "there was somebody in the house i just wanted to check and see if you guys were o.K."  my mom freaked out and woke up my dad and said "(my dad's name) get up! theirs somebody in the house." my dad flipped up really quick and said "what" my mom - " (me) said their is someone in the house, get your gun"  i said - "it's cool, they left, i took care of it i think" my dad was already up loading his gun and said "where were they?"  i said "in the den" "downstairs?" he said, me-" nope, the one next to my room.  they're not in there anymore"  dad - "how many were there?"  me - "three, but they aren't people." dad- "what?"  me - "i don't know"  dad - "did you have a nightmare?" me..."nope".  

my dad went to go check it out and i stayed in their bedroom with my mom.  he came back and said nobody was there now.  they were both freaked out and asked if i was sure i didn't just have a dream, and i said i didn't know.  they both looked at each other and my dad said, "yeah bud, you just had a dream, go back to sleep".  

the next morning at breakfast i asked everyone all these questions like what an alien was, what's gravity, etc.  my parents gave partial answers and then asked why i wanted to know.  i told them my them about the night before.  my dad mocked me as though i was trying to lie to him.  i told him "then how do i know what an alien is? how do i know the word gravity! i'm 7!! (i was pissed)" and slammed both fists on the table as hard as i could and said "if you don't want to believe me because you're scared then that's ok, but don't call me a liar, i know what i saw".  my brother then asked my parents "cooool, did (me) see aliens?"  my dad - "nooooooo, (in a weird tone that i later learned he only uses when he's lying to people or being an attention [cms/tg/pd].)"  i told him, "if you don't have anything nice to say, don't say anything at all".  my dad threatened to hit me and my mom stepped in and said "why don't we just stop talking about it."  i said - "but isn't that amazing!  i'm gonna tell everyone! what did i see? what was it? do you guys know something i don't?"  my mom said " (me)...Don't tell anyone about it, even if you do believe it's true, they'll just think you're white trash, or crazy, you'll get the same reaction from everyone else that you got from us and worse, people will make fun of you and bully you"  i said - "mom, i'm the biggest kid in my grade, i do the bullying".  my dad laughed, and i never talked about it to anyone ever again.  

believe what you want, it happened.  i've checked my room, closets, neighboring rooms, every night since.  for the next 6 months while i would often times go to sleep on one bunk bed and wake up on the other with the bed i went to sleep on completely stripped of it's sheets. or wake up with my body turned around where my feet were the night before and not remember ever getting up.  ever since then i've had problems with sleeping, my memories date back to when i was 6 months old in a shopping cart, my iq was 160 when i applied to west point in my junior year of high school.  i've always been insanely strong for my body size, my veins are bright blue no matter how tan i get, animals of all types love me immediately and i can communicate via body language extremely well, and recently, i've begun working on a quantum physics paper that redefines all science and existence itself, a paper that presents undeniable evidence in both a unified theory of everything and describes in extreme detail what the unified force of nature is....
content.summary: Entity encounter in home

content.detailedDescription:
There was three of us. we were out in the early morning sitting at a spot just south of the grand river, still dark with no cloud cover, getting ready for the sun to come up so we can start hunting for deer. we were facing north towards rattle snake butte from a low point along the grand river basin. we were chatting for a bit, all three of us were look at the butte while drinking coffee. no air traffic in the air as we could see the stars in the night brightly. 
all of a sudden something, we didnt see while we were sitting there, hovering over the buttes lit up very brightly illuminating the the whole area around the butte. i couldnt tell a distinct shape of the object, only that it was circular and starshaped as if the object was a lightbulb itself. it did not have any characteristics of a helicoptor or harrier jump jet as it seem the whole aircraft lit up. it lit up very quickly and sat there for a couple of minutes and then took off upward and away from our position at a speed not known to any aircraft that i know of. it went into space, out of our atmosphere, in a matter of milliseconds. it left a streak behind it as it went up into the sky and was gone as fast as we had seen it! the streak gave us an idea on which way it took off and was close to a 100-110 degree rise from our position. there was no noise from the object as it took off. we were about 1-2 miles away from the butte. any know aircraft made by humans would be loud and have a sound of air moving through the jet engine. this had no sound at all! 
there was three of us...My self a 25 yr old bia/government employee, a older gentleman, a 47 yr old ex-army helicopter pilot and his son a 13 year old middle school student. we were in awe for about ten minutes before we realized what we saw! we gathered our thoughts and tried to think of what the hell that was! our concensus was that we thought it was a ufo and left it at that. we sat there waiting as the sun came up, waiting for something else to appear. nothing else appeared and we went about our business and did what we came there for.
content.summary: Appeared in front of us out of nowhere, lit up bright and streaked into space at a upward-outward motion,

content.detailedDescription:
Sorry for my english, i spanish.

sorry for the quality of images. the camera is a "canon. powershot a430. 4.0 megapixels.

i'm angry for chemtrails or contrail. and take photos to sky some times at days since some weeks ago. in night too.

1. i was taken some photos before go to bed.

2. i sow the strange object the next morning. when i pass the photos to the computer. at night i not saw nothing with my eyes.

3. in the 1��� photo appear a red circle in the center. 
in the 2��� photo (make 2 or 4 seconds after the first. the time of photo machine takes to process the image and let to make other) appear a red sphera.

4. i didn't see.

5. i was somewhat excited when saw the photos in the computer. i didn't image that i caught somethig like.

if someone want the photo archive to make some analisis ask him.
sorry for the quality of camera, 2 white spots in right/dawn corner. and one or more . i think it's a fault of the camera. photos have not been edited.

the 3��� foto is so that you compare the way the camera captures since the other two pictures are at night. the photo was take one or two days before, at morning (10am). on the mediterranean coast of spain is having a strong air operation.
content.summary: Red brightnes circle becomes in sphera

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog around the block i live in and was just a few houses from my own home and was looking at the night sky because there was a full moon.  it was a few minutes after 10pm. when it came into my line of vision i thought it was a v shaped cloud i was looking at but it was moving too fast and whatever it was made absolutely no sound of any kind  and moved through the sky quickly, rather low.  it was also as if the clouds were rolling off the edges of it.  it was slightly a different color than the night sky but blended very, very well.  it looked to be the size of the small home it was flying over.  i did not see any lights on it either.  i kept looking at it flying northeast for maybe under a minute when my dog began licking my hand so i looked down at her but decided not to look back up and went into my home. as i read edavid���s report case 22911 i said ���exactly!���.  he did a great job of describing what i saw.
content.summary: V shaped camouflaged cloud

content.detailedDescription: I went to get a few item from the px and notice a star that appeared twice the size of any star i have ever seen. it remained stationary until i got to the px which took aprox. 5 min. i then stopped to obserbe the object with a few other people for about two min. when a couple of helicopters took of and as soon as the reached about 500 ft this light which did not dim, went without a doubt in a straight line away from us out of sight in less that a two seconds. we all had an eery feeling and everyone gasped. i have never seen anything like this and i have obserbed numerous aircraft flares ect. the object was physically there and went away in a unsurmountable rate of speed as the helicopter obviously went to observe. this is all i am able to say on this matter. this happened in baghdad, camp taji iraq
content.summary: Walking to px on camp taji and noticed stationary object that appeared as larger than normal star

content.detailedDescription: While looking at the sky with my binoculars,i saw 1 green and 1 red star- like objects over san francisco bay. the objecst were changing colors  from green to red together at the same time. at the time i was very tired so i did not continue to look at the object.
content.summary: Star light object changing colors

content.detailedDescription: It started off the night before(april 29) i had heard some weird sounds over my house and then last night me and 4 of my friends saw about 7 ufo's flying around the sky at around 10 pm.I was sitting inside when one of my friends who had been outside ran in and told us that he had just seen a ufo and that it had shot some kind of pod off of it.When we came out and he pointed it out we could see one big light and a little light under, so we watched it for a few minutes and then the little pod go back into the bigger one,so then scanned the skys for a minutes and found four others that looked like the first one and they were all lined up.So after about 10 minutes of watching the ufos we could see some fighter jets flying over from the next town that has a military base(in klamath falls oregon) so they circled our town and they kept flying right towards the ufo's but still keeping a good distance but when one of the jets got withing 400 hundred feet of one them it started to blink really fast and when they jet got about 400 hundred feet it had a flash and the jet flew off.So we watched them for another half an hour and then on the other side of the valley we saw a light moving (same as the first one)across the sky and when it got to a darker part of the sky with no stars we started to see something blinking in that dark spot it was about 3 times faster then the jets and by the time it was about to leave we saw the jets take off after it. and then it was pretty quite for about 15 minutes and we were looking in one area of the sky and turned around to look at one of the ufo's and when we turned back to the area sky we were looking at first we saw weird shaped clouds that wernt there 10 seconds before and they stayed they for about 10 minutes not breaking shape or moving and then we had one finale sighting when we saw a longer shaped ufo flying by with 3 lights under it and it would stall and then shoot ahead a few hundred feet and stop until it was out of sight and then by the time we all went back inside the first ufo was gone. everyone was in shocked and i was a litlle scared because of the one that had been over my house
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: We saw a bunch of ufo's flying

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my terrace. it was my usual time for a chat on the phone, with my friends over the week-end. i was about to finish my phone call and suddenly i noticed a light coming from north-west direction and go towards the south-east direction. i first thought it was a normal aeroplane, as it was a cloudy night. then i realized that it started to go back and forth in the same direction. it was doing it with great speed and the time it took to pause and then start again between its two stops were super-quick. i am sure we do not have such an aero-dynamic  technology here in india. for that matter, the whole world !

it was doing the same thing constantly for almost 20 mins.

description: it was just a flashlight like object behind the clouds. it barely came out of the clouds and when it did, i could not see it. it was totally blank. again when there was a cloud i could see the flashlight. the amazing thing was, the friend with whom i was talking to over the phone also witnessed the same thing (80 kms apart) !

i came down to my house thinking that it might abduct me, if was real !

i checked after 1 hr, but it was no where to be seen.
content.summary: It was a flash-light which circled almost 20 mins, without any sound or regular shape.

content.detailedDescription:
comet like object moved north west, over the tree line did a spriral loop
move slow, and seemed speed could not support the manuver as it circle upwards and downwards in it's loop, but it leveled out move north west over the tree line.

at first i thought it was some kind of fireworks, but was so large even at a distance of a few miles away it would have bees a treat to all on the ground, due to it's size and risk of devistation had it crashed to the ground. 

so are there fireworks that can perform such a task, with a mass of hundreds of feet in it's dimensions, with a tail that sprayed out phosphorous particles moving less than 200 ft. off the ground, 100 ft. or more above the earth horizontal to the earth?  

appeared to be heavy and labour as it did it's loops one or two loops.

- i was driving down i35 north towards dallas tx big rig driver.

- it move west ward off to my left over what looked like a very populated area. easily seen. temple, killeen, area closer to temple, tx, ft. hood
is in area within 20 minutes or so.

- horizontal to spiral, to directional change!

- i lost sight of it, when i dipped down, going down a hill, but when
i came up the hill a minut or so later, it was still move north west above the tree line, the road dipped again i lost it.

i'll have to draw it later, i just wanted to confirm it was not some new kind of firework, or if any others had observed the object.
content.summary: Comet like, phosphorous glow, tail spray coming off its fan tail. white.

content.detailedDescription:
A giant cicle shape object flew in and out of vision like these period dots . . . .  in a 90 degree angle,from top to bottom,right to left. it was flashing in and out of vision as it moved. it was the size of a nickle,looking up at the sky,and the moon was full and almost the same size.What caught be as odd,was the speed and the direct 90 degree turn.Fast!!! and amazing,like geometry the way it moved and flashed in and out    .
           .
           .
           .
. . . . . .    thats what it looked like in the sky,but the dots were nickle sized and golden orange,it was so fast ,i almost didnt belive it happened,but it did! i was at my friends house in the woods and i was looking up at the sky and zoom.I didnt even tell him it happened,it was so quick,i wonder if anybody else saw this? it was just north of fm 1488 and west of egypt honea rd. i was happy i really got the chance to see this.It lets you know that god has all the bases covered,if you know what i mean. thats the feeling i got from this experience.
content.summary: Circle shape.

content.detailedDescription:
In early spring of 1989, i lived with my aunt and uncle so i could stay in the same school district i have been going to since the beginning of the year. my grandparents raised me and my grandfather was very sick and in the hospital. so everyone agreed i should stay with my aunt to finish out the school year.

i slept in my cousin's room ,who was away at college at the time. i always locked my bedroom door before i fell asleep. i had a fear of someone breaking in the house and hurting me.

one very early morning, i was awakened with a strong feeling of someone in my room standing very close to me. i opened up my eyes and turned to my left. i could not believe my eyes! there was this thing, about toddler-sized looking back at me. it very much reminded me of bre'r rabbit's tar baby. 

it had beady red eyes and a plastered on grin. the whole being looked like used oil. it was very black and viscous. i wasn't afraid, but just curious as to how this thing got in my room with the door locked. 

i kept looking at it for another minute or so and put the sheets over my head and wished the thing would go away before i realized i would be scared. a minute or so passed by, and i heard my locked door come open. i pulled the sheet down off my head and watched as that thing flew out the door. the door softly closed back behind it. i did not dare to get up and relock the door. 

the next morning at breakfast, i asked my aunt, uncle and my other cousin if they had came into my room for something in the night. they all said they didn't and i never brought it up again.
content.summary: Visitation in teenager's room

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping and my boyfriend (at the time, we're no longer together) was awake playing video games on his computer. there was a bright light coming in that i thought was daylight. (the light was very white, unlike sunlight.)  i thought i had overslept and rolled over to rush out of bed. i looked over at my boyfriend and he looked at me terrified. i happened to look over at the clock and it was a little past 3 am! we both jumped up to look out of the window to see what in the world was going on. and as we did, the light disappeared. 



there weren't noises like one would hear coming from a helicopter or other regular flying craft.

our cats went crazy and hid under the bed for the rest of the night.
content.summary: Strange light fills room in fairview, nc

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i wanted a baked potato from wendy's. left home about 2:00am. we seen large ufo's over our truck. we thought it was maybe street lights as we're looking up and out the close tinted sunroof. once we opened the sunroof, the ufo's were large and triangle. some appeared to be following our every move. we then rushed home to get our canon camera with 6x optical zoom. we captured super clear photo's. we simply don't know what in this world can move like that. we let friends and family see the photo, yet don't know what to make of it. 

** please note ** 


 we have a still photo and can send it ups. our camera is with is with a friend. once we have our camera back we'll e-mail them to you.
content.summary: Silent, large, hovering, triagle, appear to pause for photo we snapped

content.detailedDescription: In the sky right now i am outside reporting this im speechless and afraid!! no camera to take pictures!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Its huge i

content.detailedDescription: At approxametly 9:15 pm my son was leaving the house to go home,he lives in riverside,he got into his car and drove down the street turned the corner heading east on ralston when he saw  four orange lights hovering in the north eastern sky.Since he was so close to my house he turned around and came back pounding on the front door.Yelling dad!Dad! what are these lights.My wife and i bolted out the front door and looked high above the horizon in the noth east sky and their they were four orange lights hovering.We were yelling so loud my next door neighbor also came out of her house and saw what was happening.The lights seemed to be in a formation that would change to being in a straight line to being paired off in twos.The thing is they made no sound and had no collision lights like regular civilian or military aircraft.As they continued to hang in the sky the were not decending but at times asending now we live in southern california and we see jet aircraft all the time,so i kept waiting for them to just fly over but never did,they just slowly changed formation at one point lining up all four across,them when they paired up two of the lights seemed to drop somthing we could all see this.After about twelve minutes or so the orang lights just started to dissapear not desending or asending.This event lasted about twelve minutes maybe longer i am positive other people saw this as well.
content.summary: 4 orange lights.

content.detailedDescription:
During my daily exercise walk, i spotted a mysterious cylindrical (cigar-shaped) ufo hovering low over a suburban section of richmond, virginia.  i noticed the craft during beautiful weather and clear skies at approximately 6:30 p.M. while walking east down riverside drive on the south bank of the james river.  i was casually scanning the scenery and wildlife along the river, gazing northeast toward the north bank of the river and greater richmond.

the cigar-shaped craft, perhaps the length of a football field, appeared to be a dull metallic fuselage with light and dark sections fore, aft, and amidships.  there was no writing on the craft or standard markings, no advertisements like you would expect on a blimp, and it did not appear to be a conventional blimp, derigible, or zeppelin of which i am familiar.  

i did not see any fins, stabilizers, rudders, or conventioal propulsion systems.  it was not a balloon, plane, or helicopter. i did not hear any noise coming from the craft.  there were no lights of any kind (at first), no faa port/starboard (red & green) navigation (running) lights, no headlight and no tail light, even though most conventional aircraft would be required to have such lights turned on during dusk hours, especially while operating at extra-low altitude for safety reasons. 

the cylindrical ufo was hovering low, at perhaps 1,500-2,000 feet, over what i believe was an affluent section of richmond.  i used a tall bell tower(spire) at richmond's dogwood dell carrilon (maymont park) as a point of reference.  from my location during the sighting, the tower is a few miles downriver on the northside of the james river, and the cigar-shaped ufo was hovering perhaps .25-.5 mile inland from the river maybe 1-3 miles west of the carrilon bell tower, perhaps over historic agecroft hall.

when i saw the craft, i stopped in my tracks and scrutinized it for a couple of minutes, trying to determine whether it was an unusual blimp or cylindrical ufo of possible extraterrestrial origin.  having relatives at nasa, nsa, a late uncle who once was president of the vietnam helicopter pilot's association in washington, d.C., and having myself seen apollo 16 (saturn 5b) liftoff from cape canaveral, a u.S. air force atlas centaur rocket launch, and having been on naval ships and attended the largest airshow in the u.S. three times, this large cylindrical object hovering low near the james river caught my eye.

after watching the ufo hover silently for about one minute and not seeing any lights, a bright clear-white strobe light of intense magnitude suddenly flashed one time.  the duration was very brief, a couple of seconds.  then no lights for maybe 10-15 seconds.  then another intensely-bright strobe flashed for a couple of seconds except this time the color was red.  these were the only lights seen during my approximate 10-minute viewing.  the two strobe lights flashed from the underside of the ufo at amidships.

maybe a minute after the strobe lights flashed, the craft suddenly turned slowly on its axis at maybe a 45-degree angle of rotation and then remained motionless in its new position for the remainder of my viewing.  it was as though the occupants of the craft knew (perhaps telepathically) that people on the ground were observing and thus shifted the position of the ufo in order to say "hi."

at this point, i pulled out my cell-phone, activated camera mode, and centered the viewing screen on where i knew the ufo was, but i could not see the ufo on the camera screen because of the long distance, and my phone cam does not zoom, and having photojournalism training, i decided to not take a picture believing that the distance was too far for the camera's capabilities.  the ufo was a couple of miles away on the other side of a wide river during evening hours, etc.  too bad the ets didn't zoom in (across the river) and give me a better photo-op.

at this point, i continued my walk east down riverside drive while keeping the ufo in view when it was not obstructed by foliage on the river bank.  a couple of minutes later, i came to a parking area on the banks of the river near the pony pasture river park.  i saw a solitary man (white or hispanic) in his 20s or 30s sitting indian-style on a large granite boulder in the river a few feet from the bank.  the man seemed to be gazing intently across the river, up into the air, in the directon of the cigar-shaped ufo.

i figured the man was watching what i had been watching, and he was facing away from me and did not know that i was there, so i kept quiet and did not disturb his moment of mystification.  i watched the man eyeing the ufo and the cylindrical craft itself for perhaps one minute, and neither man nor mysterious machine moved a muscle or flinched an inch.  finally, i continued my walk toward home, leaving the man solid as the giant rock that he used as a stool in a pool.

in addition, be advised that some dark unmarked black-hawk helicopters were flying around my area the same day and evening (4-30-10) which has happened during and after previous ufo sightings in my area.  there also was at least one military fighter plane that made a noisy pass at low altitude and high speed which is very unusual, so maybe the government was monitoring and/or chasing the ufo which seems to be par for the course in the united states and canada.

later that night, friday, april 30, 2010, i was prompted to visit mufon's website and was surprised to see a supporting ufo report from a man named jim in rustburg, virginia which lies 11 miles south of lynchburg and 111 miles southwest of richmond.  jim reported a cylindrical (cigar-shaped) ufo of identical description.

jim was much closer to the craft than me, however, and was able to see detail that was harder for me to discern because of the distance during my sighting.  jim's sighting occurred at 6:47 a.M. and my sighting was farther east at about 6:30 p.M.

better still, jim was a professional witness and said in his mufon report, case # 23052, that he was an ex-army and navy career man with a naval-intelligence background and "studied all types of conventional and unconventional aircraft."

"i'm in the army national guard and have seen uav aircraft in iraq, this was different," jim said.

"this object had no fins or wings visible of any type and no engines visible. it was simply a straight cigar or cylinder shape with some object below it or attached to it. it had no rotors or wings and made no noise. it moved slowly and straight. this was absolutely baffling," jim added.

after seeing jim's report and telling my friend, josh, who, with his wife, saw a green sphere/tear-drop ufo descend over south richmond (chesterfield county) in november 2009, i decided to file my own mufon report to perhaps lend more credence to the report from jim in rustburg, va.  

furthermore, other reputable witnesses, including scientists and government employees, have seen and reported cylindrical and disc-shaped ufos downriver from richmond near the surry nuclear-power plant and also near the north anna nuclear power plant on lake anna in central virginia.  

my wife and i, and tens of thousands of others, also saw numerous green-sphere ufos descend along the east coast in march 2009.  richmond's daily newspaper, the richmond times-disptatch, ran a cover story which mentioned the lights and accompanying sonic booms but did not investigate adequately and failed to connect this to simultaneous ufo reports aired on tv stations in tidewater virginia.  

there are numerous mufon reports on file about these sightings.  bottom line: more and more ufos and ets are being seen everyday and everywhere, and each individual must draw their own personal conclusions as to why.

attached are two photos of cylindrical ufos that look similar to the ufo that i saw over richmond, va on friday, 4-30-2010.  the first photo synchronistically features a ufo that was farther east over the ocean off virginia beach, va on august 9, 2009.  the second photo was taken by members of c-seti (center for the study of extraterrestrial intelligence) a little farther south off the coast of north carolina's outer banks in april 2009, one year earlier than mine and jim's sightings in central and southwestern virginia.  the c-seti members say they "contacted" the extraterrestrials aboard the cylindrical ufo.

note:  i cropped and enlarged the image of the cigar-shaped ufo over va beach which made the craft more visible but also resulted in pixel distortion around the object because of the extreme magnification, but this distortion is to be expected.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Cylindrical ufo hovers low over suburban area, turns slowly on axis, flashes 2 quick strobes.

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving home after completing a flight from jacksonville to saint petersburg. when i crossed over a bridge not far from home, i began noticing several lights through the trees to the north. they immediately drew my attention because they were above the street lights and were in places where there weren't buildings - the color of the lights made me think of some sort of light that might mark the edge of a building. i spent a few seconds trying to decide if my perspective of where buildings were located was somehow skewed, but realized that the apartment building i was about to pass was not that tall. switching my thinking to airborne objects, i ran down the possibilities of civil or military aircraft. i also considered somehow flares being dropped, but the location would have had them strung across the pinellas county peninsula - something i'm positive would not happen. i am a pilot and am aware of where traffic going into tampa international, st. petersburg-clearwater, and albert whitted should be, depending upon the winds. additionally, i had just flown through tampa's airspace and knew that commercial traffic was landing to the south at tampa and so nothing would be this far south of the airports. by the time those few seconds had gone by, i needed to make a left turn and so continued to watch the lights now more to my right, though still in visible through the windshield. at this point, i could see there were many lights in a fairly large array or formation but i did not take a conscious count of how many objects i could see. also, instead of stopping to take a good look, i chose to call my girlfriend to get a corroborating witness to this observation. unfortunately, i was unable to raise her and had to complete the remaining drive in order to get her attention and get her outside. by the time she was able to make it outside, only a single object remained visible, which she saw and described without my prompting as the color of flame, two diamond -shaped objects connected and under positive control moving right to left. she is also a pilot and discounted military traffic departing the nearby airbase under full military power since there was no noise to be heard (i had flown over the base 30 minutes previously and knew there was zero activity taking place at macdill). she also noted the objects were low - again, i had not at that point told her anything about what i had already seen.

my rough recollection of the configuration is two objects on the right - perhaps 15 degrees apart from my moving vantage point, three in a line at the top center of the array, and another three or four below them, but more spread out, and possibly one more to the left of the three aligned objects. the overall size of the display i would estimate at roughly the size of orion (tipped over on its side), though perhaps slightly larger. i am also an amateur astronomer and so am very familiar with the constellations, visible planets, and the general color and motion of meteors as they burn up in the atmosphere.

as i said, i never stopped to get a proper, stable view of the flight, and by the time i had pulled into my driveway and retrieved my girlfriend from the house, only a single object remained. during the drive home, i was unable to determine the relative motion of the objects.

my feelings throughout were excitement for having finally seen something i knew was not readily identifiable. furthermore, afterward, i was very annoyed for worrying more about getting a witness than getting a good look at the objects.
content.summary: Formation flight of yellowish-red diamond shaped objects

content.detailedDescription: It had been storming all day and around 8p.M i went outside on the front porch to check the weather. as i sat in my chair i noticed to my left a light that would shine my way. i thought it was my glasses reflecting light so i cleaned them and kept watching the wind and lighting. i got up from my chair and went to the steps and gazing up in the sky i looked to my left above some trees and saw what i thought to be an airplane. it had red lights blinking and a bright light that would shine on and off. then the light which looked like a spotlight aimed toward my way so i thought it must be a helicopter. my concern was the weather was really bad and it was lighting alot so i could not believe that an aircraft would be flying in the weather.It came closer and the craft's spotlight come on and zoomed the light at the back yard of my neighbors house below me. it lit up the whole yard so i called for my 2 boys to come see. my son chris who is 25 came running out but my 13 year was to scared. by the time chris got outside the spotlight turned off and all he could see was the red lights. then out of nowhere it fell straight to the ground. it was a bright red ball and it fell like falling out of the sky which it did. we stood there waiting to hear a crash or see fire but nothing. it never made a sound at any time. then a few minutes later it appeared in the sky again with its red lights flashing. i called my sister which lives close by to see if she could see it but she never did.While i was on the phone with her the spot light once again turned toward the direction of my house and i started telling her its here again. the lights are shining toward my house. this encounter lasted on and off for about 1 hour. then it disappeared.This craft never moved much it stayed in the same spot the whole time which i thought was strange. i know people will think i am crazy but i know what i saw. i was so frozen that i did'nt think to take pictures until my sister said go get your camera and get a video. i did get my camera but never could see it again. i am going back outside as soon as i finish this and if i can see it again i will video it and send it in.
content.summary: Red lights around and a spot light that lit up on and off

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside talking to my friend after i had taken my dog for a walk, and it only happened in a few seconds. he had his back to where i witnessed this. i seen it behind him in the field. it had to have only been about 35 feet above the ground. i don't know what it was doing. i saw a bright green glowing triangular type craft going downwards towards the ground at a very high speed. i only seen it for about 5 seconds. i was about 15 ft long, it wasn't very big. i asked if he had seen it and he had not. he went to leave and i went to the field to look around but i didn't see anything. i have never seen anything like this. 
i noticed it because it was just in the area i was looking. i heard a sound that sounded like a jet, but different, i can't really explain it. it was just going downwards like towards the ground very very fast.
since i had last put in a report here with photos and and information i have noticed an increase in activity around here, maybe it's just a coincidence but i do not know.
i also notice the increased activity of jets flying over where we live. many, many of them. i don't understand it. and i am not going to sit back and not notice it, no way.
content.summary: Bright glowing green triangular craft going downwards fast

content.detailedDescription: Was on my way to the store and looked up into the sky and notice an object which we've seen on sever different sightings. so i ran to get my dad and brothers and a pair of binoculars. focused in and noticed there was actually two objects spinning around one another and were traveling south-west to north-east but when following the flight pattern changed and jumped to spot to spot till we lost sight. when trying to findit my dad spotted a different object close to the original object first spotted. he focused in and was completely different craft. he said it was a slightly elongated, round with a flat bottom, and appeared to be a light of transparent window in the front. we tracked the object a little bit more til it disappeared from sight.
content.summary: White star like object

content.detailedDescription:
We were on the beach and both noticed the same 'star' start to move in an irratic pattern but moving downward in the east north east sky. at first we just thought it was falling or shooting star but it had no tail. it seemed to fall straight for a few seconds but the almost started spinning in the sky. it moved left and then right but continued in a downward pattern. the whole event took 3 or 4 minutes and we both kept our eyes on it as it got more and more distant. it may have burnt out or just took off into the distance. we couldn't be sure. both of us kept saying to each other, "oh my god, what is this?"
we laughed saying, "is this a ufo?"
then we got quiet as this went on for too long to not be something real!
we have looked all over the internet to find if anyone else has reported this and found this site to make our own report.
content.summary: It looked like a falling star but keep wiggling back and forth downward in the east north east sky

content.detailedDescription: I was heading to work at 10:45 on april 29th 2010, driving on 101 south...Towards nipomo, and i was enjoying the full moon light making everything so bright in front of me. i was getting close to laetitia vineyards when all of a sudden a red round light popped up further away in the distance, straight ahead of me...Over the freeway. it immediately got my attention as i recognized it from not too long ago, hovering over the freeway closer to my home in grover beach. i had only watched it for about a few seconds when a beam of light shot out from underneath the red light, towards the ground. i don't know if it reached the ground, but it appeared that way to me. the beam of light was white in color and was wider down at the bottom. it lasted only roughly 3 seconds, when it went back up to the red light/craft. the red light then went over the freeway and took off across the laetitia vineyards. again, as with the first sighting of this light, i saw a white light "behind" it. none of the lights pulsed or blinked, and there was no sound from it. i had my windows down.
content.summary: Red light shooting out beam of light

content.detailedDescription: We have a small mt. range across a field behind our house. i don`t remember the exact year/date or time so this is approx. i was sitting in the kitchen on a sunny morning(it faces the mt range) having coffee. i started to see a brilliant shiny silver dome shaped object coming up from between the mt ranges. it continued to rise and get bigger. i sat there watching this for several mins. trying to figure out what it was. i finally ran and got my husband, who grabbed the camera. we ran outside. the object was now in the sky and a cylinder shape and not as shiny but plainly visible in the sky. the object was moving away from us so my husband started to snap pictures. it moved very slowly and wasn`t that far up in the sky. you could see it rotate. it continued to move away for several seconds then stopped. it came back toward the house. by now we were out of film. it came down lower, still rotating, stopped above me, stopped rotating and opened a door on the side of it. closed the door, started to rotate and the went over the house. we ran to the front of the house and continued to watch it move off. after a min. or so of it moving away it sped up rapidly, moved higher in the sky and vanished. this all want on for quite a few mins. from start to it vanishing. we told my daughter and her husband about the incident and they took a ride to the mt. area. there is a very small dirt road between the ranges with lots of forest and tall trees. there isn`t enough room to send up a small balloon let alone the size of the object we saw. i have the pictures but they are at a distance when the object was moving away from us. i`ve tried to enlarge the object. you can see the cylinder shape but the photos loose their sharpness with the programs i have. i`ve never seen anything like this before or after.
content.distance: 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo rising from mt. area into sky.

content.detailedDescription: From a child really, it's weird and confuseing, sometimes i think i am a alien hybrid or something. this particular sighting/meeting was spurred from a event that occured in approx: 1995 or 1996, i was driveing from the east coast to california, in the arizona area within a 100 miles of the eastern state-line, on i-10. it was night, with a full-moon. i was not all that tired, as i had slept most of the day at a motel a couple hundred miles back east. of a sudden i had this over-whelming "influence" to stop on the side of the interstae in an area of the high-mesa's. i did. there was one particular mesa, that kept drawing my attention, lights began circleing it, somehow i was impressed with the idea that a mother ship was buried/hidden somehow within. although not tired, i feel into a deep, strange sleep, with many odd and strange looking creatures commuteing with me, as if in a deep sleep, yet seeing, yet awake. all these things i saw and heard (mother ship hidden within the mountain, and odd snake-like aliens communeing, yet not speaking sounds, i could understand "most" of what they were saying.)in this wide-awake, yet deep-sleep state. (though i never was asleep). now, this stuck in my mind, (whereas dreams fade rather quickly, this never did, but like i said i had prior experiences to this.), so, in about 2006 or so i believe it was (i came back from hawaii in 2003, lived in ocean side ca. a few years, went around the phoenix area looking for cheaper land-house deals, and once there, it all became "over-whelming" again.), i purchased tent, sleeping bag, camping supply stuff, and determined to trek out into the desert, and camp out awhile by the "hidden in the mountain ages old mother-ship", this turned into a several month camping trip for me. for a long time, nothing unusual. then, at last, one night as i was prepareing to sleep, that "odd feeling" overwhelmed me again, i looked out from my tent (it was summer, and both scorpions and snakes roam at night, scorpions are not very friendly, unless a coyote pack befriends you to keep them off as scorpions avoid their fur-oils, and snakes avoid humans if they can, so i mostly stayed in the tent except daylight hours). that odd-drawing feeling, 4 glowing, saucer shaped ufo's appeared, sometimes hovering, sometimes coming closer to me, sometimes farther away, after a bit, these odd snake-like aliens came around and communed, again, they remembered me from before, and before that, though they were'nt the exact same ones as beforetimes, they knew me from the others of their kind, that i had met before somehow, and they knew all that had transpired in past events i had with others of their kind. though they made hiss-like sounds i could not understand, i could understand most of what they said., this time they had what looked like wild-ferral hogs with them (common for the area), yet they also could speak with me, yet not with words, but i understood most of what they said., and the intelligence in the eyes of these was astounding, not like hog eyes, much more-so than human eyes., i followed them into the desert most of the night, they wanted to show me a thing, fiannly we came to several cows that had escaped a fence and were wandering free., of a sudden one of the glowing ufo's (which had remained behind over my camp in the desert area)came up so fast that it seemed to almost just "appear" (these ufo's made no sound my ears could detect, and i hear much better than most)and they moved fast. a yellowish orange blue glow came from it, one of the cows shook, mooed once, and fell over on its side. other aliens came up to it, the cow swelled up like it had been dead and bloated for days or weeks, they used strange devices, and light devices on it, somehow it was cut open in areas, i asked if they were going to eat the cow, they said they were recovering something that had been growing in the cow, that they had implanted there some-time back. (again i could'nt understand everything they commuted to me.) either i could'nt understand, or (i think) they would'nt tell me exactly what and why they were growing things in such ways in cows, diseases kept coming to mind though, strange, new diseases to affect most humans in odd new ways, but i suspect they tried (and mostly did) to keep the full matter from me.... like i said, that was one of many times since i was a small child, i have had encounters. i have seen much more horrible things from these aliens than killing and cutting up a cow.(though never directed at me.) i had the distinct impression that they were going to send me a bunch of gold, money, win the california lotto, or something of value, to purchase a large tract of land, so that they could come/go/live in relative peace there on,with me sorta "owning the land" and keeping them safe, unseen and secure. that has not occured yet, unless someone stole it when they brought it to me when i was asleep in the tent in the desert, or some other time, someone stole it. which would not be wise at all for human-kind. well, i'm tired of writing for now, theres much more, but i'm tired of writing for now. -jim
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving with two other people in my car and we were coming home from the store. 
we saw a enormous red sphere in front of and over our car. the height seemed to be about 500 to 800 feet above us. 
i stopped the car and looked out the window. then i got out of the car for a better look. 
we were in awe at what we saw and transfixed on the spot. at first i thought it was the moon, then i thought maybe it was a hot air balloon or a weather balloon. then i just didn't know what i was looking at. it was close. it did not move.
the red sphere was stationary in the air, deep red and orange, mostly red and it seemed to have a pulse to it. there was no noise. the surface of it looked smooth but there appeared to be a red haze of slightly transparent red fog around it. it did not seem mechanical. we were on a very dark country road about two miles from home. it was a warm summer night. the sky was clear and i could see the stars far away. the date i wrote is approximate.
the sight caused a really terrifying fear in me and i drove home as fast as i could. i drove about half a mile and turned left and the object was gone. my two companions were terrified. when we got home, my friend at the house complained that we had been gone so long. the entire trip felt like it took 20 minutes total, but we had been gone for two hours. there is no way that trip to the store can take two hours. something happened.
i never believed in ufos, and i am a super skeptic, but i don't know what we saw that night. i can't explain what happened. 
there was nothing in the paper the following day. nothing was reported on the radio. there were no reports of weather balloons or anything strange.
if i had to guess the size of the object, i would say it appeared to be about five times the size of a round city water tower top.
content.summary: Red sphere and lost time

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the army, in basic training at ft.Jackson s.Carolina in 1968..Co.D..The whole company was on the night firing line in the woods in the month of august, and there was a full moon rising above the tree line, and the moon looked huge...Most of the company was sitting in the bleachers waiting for their turn to go down to the line to fire their weapons..When all of a sudden somebody yelled out  "look,look!" and we all turned to our right,and then thats when we saw a black cigar shaped object, moving really slow and with no noise, crossing in front of the moon.That is when you could see the portal windows, 2 open bay doors at it's stomach area of the ship, with a very bright light coming out of them, with 2 small 'scout ships' or 3 man ships, quietly riding underneath the belly of the ship...I have since that time have been studying the ufo phenomena ever since, that's how i know about what i saw that night in 1968..Where a 110 military personal including nco;s and officers saw this all together...The next morning we were told literally, "forget about what you think you saw last night, you all going to vietnam to die, so it doesn't matter!"...Said sgt.Powers my platoon sargent at that time. i found years later in george adamski's book  "flying saucers have landed" has a photo in it of the cigar shaped mother ship that i also saw , 11 years after he did.
my second incident happened in the woods on november of 1968, at approximatly at 11 pm...I was with my army buddy tom hudson from hartford connecticut whose father was a vice president of hartford bell telephone, at that time...Tom's father had brought his car down from connecticut so he would have some transport while he was in ait(advanced individual training) as we were both stationed now at ft.Gordon georgia for signal school..We both had a weekend pass and decided to go into augusta, where he picked up a girl....We then all hopped in his car a (ford fairlane 389)it was fast...She told tom of a place we could go to, so they could get intimate...She took us into the woods about 20 minutes to a half hour outside of augusta...It was dark and about 10 11pm...As we were going into the woods we wound up in a circular clearing in the woods that she knew about, and we came into it and tom drove the car around in the circle, to face the way out . at this time i got out of the car so they could be alone...I remember a creek about 30 feet down from the car, and i went down to it...I looked around as it was a bit dark at that time in the woods but i could see the top of some kind of a building about 100 yards down the creek from  me, where i was standing, and thinking what kind of a building would be in these woods?( i found out years later it was a building for hydro electricity)...When all of a sudden i saw something out the side of my right eye, something was above the tree line and moving, but it was dark, and thought "well that isn't a helicopter" cause there was no sound...Now i don't know how much time went by during this incident.I dont' know if i was taken into the ship and then released, i no accounting of any time..But i do remember when the lights came on...And they came on slowly and the sequence was red to yellow to blue to green, going around the middle of the ship as it was 'bobbing' in the air and moving back and forth...Then i remember banging on the back of the car yelling to tommy "i see one, i see one!"...And at that moment it went forward, then back, then forward then in a blink of an eye shot out towards space...And we drove out of there very fast...Tommy didn't see anything as he was with the girl ...These incidents to the best of my memory happened to me...And since have been a  believer ever since...John trevisano, jr. april 30th, 2010
content.summary: A cigar shaped whip with portal windows and 2 open bay doors with 2 smaller ships.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the intersection of flamingo and hualapai coming out of a store and happened to be looking west. i saw 6 or 7 white objects that i first thought were balloons but then realized they weren't moving like balloons that had been released into the sky.  these white objects were not planes, or helicopters as there was no motor/engine noise.  they moved in all directions but not as if the wind was blowing them. and it did not look like a formation, yet all the objects stayed within a close distance to each other.  it didn't last long before they moved off into the distance and i could not see them any longer.  i've never seen anything like this before so i felt the need to report it. did anyone else see this? i know the time is accurate within a few minutes because i have a receipt that has the time on it from the store i was in a few minutes before.
content.summary: 6 or 7 white objects, moving in controlled manner

content.detailedDescription: I went out side for a smoke i had been there for mabybe 5 minutes when i just happen to look up and see it appear it resembled a star or the international space station when it flies over. it moved to the north west with side to side manuvers. it was way too slow for a meteor. it disappeared over the horizon.
content.summary: Appeared from nowhere and moved to the nothwest. high altitude

content.detailedDescription: Here's a couple pics straight from the backyard at around 9pm. object in question is just to the left of street lamp in photo's. stationary for hours. blinks red and white and or blue and white and level of intensity seems to really change. one minute it looks huge and very bright in the sky and the next appearing very small and dim and others completely out of sight for minutes at a time and then turning back on.
content.summary: Fake star, planet , ufo or what
